article.title: Ishee Assigned to U.S. Naval Forces Europe-6th Fleet
article.text: Rear Adm. Thomas E. Ishee, USN, will be assigned as director, plans and operations, U.S. Naval Forces Europeâ€“6th Fleet; deputy commander, 6th Fleet; commander, Submarines, Allied Naval Forces South; and commander, Submarine Group 8, Naples, Italy.
